storyInfo: Ch'en is eager to take part in the competition, but finds out from Ernesto that Lin Yühsia got into a fight. She hurries after, but together with Lin Yühsia, mistakenly enters a championship prelim arena.

attributes.content: (There's about as many people as Siesta, but the atmosphere's completely different.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Everywhere I look, bars, casinos, restaurants...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey, pretty lady, wanna come join us on the beach?
attributes.name: Flighty Tourist

attributes.content: Piss. Off.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Lin Yühsia vanished into thin air this morning.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I was just about to give that stinky sewer rat another call.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I may not come here often, but I'm pretty sure those special forces are up to no good.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Have you met Lin? From the slums?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I have. He's a nice old man. Nicer than my grandpa anyway.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They call him the 'Rat King.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Aren't the men behind the curtain all like such? But he's really a good person.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I never thought Yühsia would turn out like this. She was such a shy and timid girl, the kind who would always hide behind you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I don't think she's changed. She just... took on responsibility. Maybe the kind she couldn't handle.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Whatever, she can't hide for long.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: *sigh*. I'm already here. May as well find something to do.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Like what... buy some Dossoles goodies?)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (It'd be kind of complicated to ship souvenirs to Hoshiguma and Swire... I'll just wait for them to visit Rhodes Island.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Right, I need to get a thank-you gift for Lady Fumizuki too.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (As for the Rhodes Islanders... Shirayuki, Bagpipe, Amiya, and... her?)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Whatever. It's a lot of people to buy for, and I don't know if I can carry that much back. We'll see how things go.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (But I get the feeling this won't need too long...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Should I go for a walk...? I guess I'll be walking, no matter what I do.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Maybe have Ernesto give me a quick tour of the city?)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Nah... I don't know him well enough.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Right, there was what Mayor Candela said...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: These past few days, circulation of weapons in the city has grown unusually prevalent. If you feel you aren't having as much fun as you'd like at any point during your stay here, perhaps you should try your hand at the investigation. For fun.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: (For a mayor, she clearly doesn't care one bit about her own city. How did Wei Yenwu get a friend like that?)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (And besides, this city is one big luxury resort. It practically defines 'decadent'...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (This place is more Swire's speed. I'd rather be back in Siesta.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Ugh, what—ever. I'm here already, and investigating's better than nothing. Let's give it a fair shake.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (I could ask Ernesto about Mayor Candela's case, but if they had any definite leads, something would've happened long ago.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Just asking won't get me anywhere. Roaming it is. Start by getting the lay of the land.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How was the fight last night?
attributes.name: Chagrined Male Tourist

attributes.content: Won a few thousand. You?
attributes.name: Cheerful Male Tourist

attributes.content: Ugh. I lost bad.
attributes.name: Chagrined Male Tourist

attributes.content: Ha ha, no biggie. Just win it back today, right?
attributes.name: Cheerful Male Tourist

attributes.content: Conchetumare, I was gonna, even if you didn't say. It's just better here. No way I wanna go back.
attributes.name: Chagrined Male Tourist

attributes.content: I hear you. Once we get out of this place, it's back to death and gore again.
attributes.name: Cheerful Male Tourist

attributes.content: Damn, you know? If we just had the money to buy an apartment here.
attributes.name: Cheerful Male Tourist

attributes.content: Win enough bets and we will, yeah?
attributes.name: Chagrined Male Tourist

attributes.content: Ha ha ha, you got me there!
attributes.name: Cheerful Male Tourist

attributes.content: Excuse me, lovely young lady, could I interest you in a job at our bar?
attributes.name: Upbeat Bartender

attributes.content: A woman as gorgeous as you could make crazy money in one night.
attributes.name: Upbeat Bartender

attributes.content: Piss. Off.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Casinos, bars, restaurants, karaoke boxes. Is that all they ever built in this city?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...The preliminary phase is near its end.
Ch'en turns to look, and realizes the voice is coming from a display TV in a shop window.
Locals and visitors from afar, are you having the vacation time of your lives?
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: I lost three hundred thousand at the casino last night, but you bet I'm gonna win it back today.
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: So, after ten days of fierce competition, the Dossoles Warrior Champion holds its final prelim contest today!
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: And this afternoon at 3 P.M.—that's in three hours, folks—we'll be treated to the final Smash Splash Prelim!
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: It's a bout you championship-lovers absolutely cannot miss! Be there, and bathe in the excitement!
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: But of course, there's no need to panic if you don't wanna fight the scorching heat or the crowds! Keep your eyes on our official channel, and we'll have live coverage for you!
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: And before we forget, we've got some news for you music-heads that'll shake the world.
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: That's right, you've probably already heard—in a huge move, Mayor Candela has invited the Monster Siren Records legend, D.D.D.
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: And that's not all. The masked musician's unleashing more than her bold electro. She's going to be hosting the championship!
attributes.name: TV Presenter

attributes.content: Nina, c'mon, didn't you hear that? Three hours until the match starts.
attributes.name: Impatient Male Tourist

attributes.content: What's so fun about a fight? It's barbarous.
attributes.name: Sluggish Female Tourist

attributes.content: Anyone who passes the scrimmage prelim ends up a dark horse in the championship. It's something you've gotta keep tabs on.
attributes.name: Impatient Male Tourist

attributes.content: Then you go watch. Tell me what happens.
attributes.name: Sluggish Female Tourist

attributes.content: Come on, lady... pft, fine. I'll go on my own, then, suit yourself.
attributes.name: Impatient Male Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, you think it's true? I heard D.D.D. was coming a few days ago, but I had no idea if it's for real.
attributes.name: Male Music-Loving Tourist

attributes.content: If I'm remembering right, she was in Siesta just last month. Wild that she's here in Dossoles now.
attributes.name: Female Music-Loving Tourist

attributes.content: And how do you even get her to host your thing? What did Mayor Candela say to win her over?!
attributes.name: Female Music-Loving Tourist

attributes.content: Her?
attributes.name: Male Music-Loving Tourist

attributes.content: You didn't know? We got strong odds nowadays that D.D.D.'s a female artist.
attributes.name: Female Music-Loving Tourist

attributes.content: Huh... doesn't mean much to me if she's a man or a woman. What really matters is our ears are in for a treat!
attributes.name: Male Music-Loving Tourist

attributes.content: Ch'en realizes that practically everyone is talking about the competition.
(Seems it's gripped the whole city.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (If you want to get something done here, what better way than to go undercover as a competitor? Think of all the opportunities you could make out of the chaos.)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (And in that case...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey, is that Miss Ch'en? Haha, sorry, I'm a little tied up on this end right now.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hiyah!
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Gaagh!
attributes.name: Sound from Receiver

attributes.content: Are you fighting with someone? What's going on?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's a long story. The short version is Miss Lin is having trouble making friends.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Where are you? I'll come over.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sure, I'm at...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Three hours ago
Why did you help him?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Juvenile.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Need me to assist, Miss Lin?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You said you were very familiar with this city.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Any options for a small, independent, quiet casino?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Independent, quiet... You want the kind of place where you can make trouble without it blowing up?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: No worries, then. With Ms. Candela around, no one will dare get in your way.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: No. I want the kind that won't be a pain to tidy up.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: ...I get you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: This is the place?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Right. A casino bar, more precisely.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The proprietor, Arraz, started it from nothing. Gave it everything he had to make it on this street, and got the place to where it is today.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The powers on the streets around all want it for themselves, but nobody's got the teeth to break through his bones.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Excellent.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You wait here.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: May I ask if you're here to drink, or to play a hand?
attributes.name: Casino Hotshot

attributes.content: To play a hand.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: T-Tough lady we got here...
attributes.name: Casino Hotshot

attributes.content: Q-Quick, call the boss!
attributes.name: Casino Hotshot

attributes.content: Miss, I don't care who you are, but you're too big for your britches, all alone and rowdy in a place like this.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Cut the drivel. Deal.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Quads. Heheheh...
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Straight flush.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: How?!
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: You're awful at palming cards.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Miss, I'll admit you might have some real skill...
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Can we speed this up? Draw, already. I'm in a hurry.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Grr. It's go time, boys!
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Well, I did familiarize myself with her...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But this is the way the Rat King's daughter does things.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Where's Lin Yühsia?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're here, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That bunch ran after they couldn't handle Miss Lin. She went to chase them down.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Which way?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That way, towards the beach.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Got it. I'll go check it out.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They sprint fast, I'll give them that.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia, what the hell are you doing?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en Hui-chieh? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm the one asking you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Gah, where'd this nutcase pop up from? We can't beat her, we can't shake her off.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Boss, what do we do?
attributes.name: Casino Hotshot

attributes.content: What else? Keep running.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Is that... where they're hosting the scrimmage prelim?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Heh, perfect. We're going in!
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Found them.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: No time to babysit you right now.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hold it!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There you are.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You even found us here?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Hmph. Good thing we've got plenty of help on hand.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Guys, let's go!
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Where are we...? Isn't this the Smash Splash place they mentioned on TV?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Grr. I guess we'll have to clear the field first.
attributes.name: Ch'en
